name: Traitor's End
description:
Traitors End is an experimental RPG simulating the opening of a story, here you progress through some treacherous woods and the thoughts of your character (the hunter) are documented throughout. It was developed during university term as a challenge to develop one game per week.

For myself, this was the opportunity to test and experiment parent-child objects, collider boxes and an event manager in the Unity Engine. I have uploaded here for you all to test and perhaps offer some feedback, it is a development I have sidelined for now but would love to work on in the future!

Be brave, hunter!
